statements: DELETE FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name = 'color' AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = 1 AND setting_name = 'brightness';
DELETE FROM device_settings WHERE setting_value = 'high' AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name = 'power' AND setting_value = 'on';
DELETE FROM device_categories WHERE device_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
DELETE FROM device_categories WHERE device_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
DELETE FROM logs WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Printer') AND log_timestamp < '2021-01-01';
